short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: shows videos next to the releases on a store's page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple Chrome extension makes digging through a Discogs store more convenient by directly placing the YouTube videos that have been linked to a release next to it. Say goodbye to endless back and forth between release and store page!
